response.overview: Everyone deserves a great love story, but for 17-year-old Simon Spier, it's a little more complicated. He hasn't told his family or friends that he's gay, and he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate that he's fallen for online.
response.tagline: Everyone deserves a great love story.
response.title: Love, Simon

titles.title: Simon vs. The Homo Sapiens Agenda
